title: Cacao Ceremony ~ New Moon Meditation ~ Energy Healing
description: Cacao Ceremony ~ New Moon Meditation ~ Energy Healing Hosted By Glowing Energy. Event starts on Thursday, 14 September 2023 and happening at Glowing Energy, Miller Place, NY. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: You are invited to experience this heart opening sacred drink of ceremonial cacao while guided through a New Moon meditation and hands on healing. The new moon is a time to plant seeds of hope and new beginnings. The promise of new light. A time to set our intentions and open to new possibilities. Cacao enhances our experience of connecting in with ourselves, our intentions and it opens the heart to immense feelings of love and oneness. This high vibrational cacao has been used since ancient times by indigenous people to connect spiritually and nourish the soul. It has a wide range of health benefits, contains antioxidants and boost the immune system. This is such a special treat, if you haven't tried cacao, come and join us. And if you have, each experience is one of a kind. What to expect: Learn about this ancient plant medicine and its benefits, while you sip and savor its taste.
